content: How has no one commented on this yet (from what I can see). I’ve traveled to the dark, dark darkness deep. It was nearly my final destination – no return ticked needed, thanks. I had a note ready scripted and everything. I needed to know the darkness made you see the light more fully. I get it now. But this is so important to know. Love saved me. Love for my wife and my son. It’s so important to know what brings you joy because it really is the guiding light out of darkness. I love this. Thank you for putting it in words…the kind of words that can literally save people ❤ …share wisely people.
